Thomas Lawrence Korn

  1. Alternate Birth Name: [Tom]
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Samuel A. and Hilda Peterson
  4. Location of Family: Swedeburg, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Stromsburg, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: 1903-01-28, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1978-06-04
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 6 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p.209-213; Stromsburg Headlight, 12 February 1914; National Orphan Train Complex; Cobblestone April 1989, vol. 19, Issue 4.
